Introduction
This topic contains information on RO responsibilities with regard to CHAMPVA, including
requests for information regarding CHAMPVA eligibility
responsibility for
responding to requests for information regarding CHAMPVA eligibility
, and
notifying claimants and handling disagreements
, and
notifying
Veterans of their dependents’ potential entitlement to CHAMPVA
survivors of their potential entitlement to CHAMPVA
the Health Administration Center (HAC) of changes in a dependent’s status
, and
HAC after discontinuing a Veteran’s P&T disability rating
.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section H - Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs (CHAMPVA) Eligibility Determinations
